name: Wheel of Fortune (itch) (Aw_Someone)
description:
If there's someplace you need to go but you only have a wheel, then just roll with it! Wheel of Fortune is a racing-roguelite where you roll with your giant wheel, hoping that you someday make it to the amusement park you've always dreamt of.

This game was created by two pople me, who di dprogramming and sound and another person who did 3d models and the logo. All was done during the game jam. This is my first game jam and I am thankful for any comments and feedback!
